1.16.24  8:12 pm   What's your weirdest question?

Â Â Â Â Â  i can't possibly beat this one. not because it's the weirdest, but just because it's impossible to measure weirdness. for that reason, this is in fact a weird question, but there is no way to measure it precisely enough for assured comparisons

1.16.24  7:53 pm   im about to start as an intern tomorrow any pointers on how to pretend I'm a professional and normal part of society? I need to make a good impression you know.

Â Â Â Â Â  you have to discover the secret fact that your actual self already is a professional and normal part of society. the problem is that no one tells you this. and you may not have told anyone else either

1.16.24  7:41 pm   i'm having a creative crisis. i want to create original things, but in deliberately trying not to follow the established rules, i realized is just giving myself a new set of rules to follow, which is also making me stressed. how to i escape this endless cycle of rules and just create things i want to?

Â Â Â Â Â  the cycle of rules re-inventing, re-destroying, and re-re-inventing each other is something that hopefully you can learn to enjoy. it may help to know that these contradictions are nothing to be ashamed of, and they are at the core of what has fueled 'art' (also known as 'rta', 'tra', among other names) since the beginning of time

1.16.24  7:08 pm   what is the definition of fish 

Â Â Â Â Â  i have no idea. this whole time i've just been guessing what is a fish and what is not

Â Â Â Â Â  no

Â Â Â Â Â  i like how down to earth it is

1.16.24  3:16 pm   Do you have any animals?

Â Â Â Â Â no, but if you find this unsettling, feel free to pretend that you can

1.16.24  1:30 pm   bill, you say you have not eaten blades of grass in real life, but would you be willing to, as an experiment? like one of those "try new things" sorts of things they keep telling me about

Â Â Â Â Â i would rather try a different new thing

1.16.24  1:15 pm   In the history of time, many people have asked what the deal is, and it intrigues me that we are no closer to discovering the answer.

Â Â Â Â Â there are many different answers, to try out

     Do you have any ideas, Bill? Any at all?

Â Â Â Â Â yes i do. i've made a habit of expressing the ideas i have

1.16.24  1:00 pm   im quite uncertain for the future right now. what should i do?

Â Â Â Â Â  take on some exciting challenges, of moderate difficulty

1.16.24  10:56 am   How many things of the things you've said you've done have you actually done

Â Â Â Â Â  that depends if you've been trying to interpret my songs and fictitious works as factual statements about me

1.16.24  9:17 am   what's the weakest song you've written & what's the weakest line you've written?

Â Â Â Â Â  all of them are tied for weakest

1.16.24  8:49 am   is learning the ukulele a good bridge to learning the guitar or should I just jump straight to the guitar

Â Â Â Â Â  ukulele is fine to start with, especially if you get the baritone ukulele which is tuned exactly the same way as the high guitar strings. the regular ukuleles however, usually have one of the strings jump an octave which might confuse you in the transition

1.16.24  5:18 am   if i could rather eat a cookie covered in gasoline or drink gasoline mixed with cookie what one should i pick?

Â Â Â Â Â  i don't care. poisoning yourself is none of my business and it's not something i'm interested in

1.16.24  4:50 am   How is your latest project going?

Â Â Â Â Â  good

1.16.24  4:22 am   what is the best superpower 

Â Â Â Â Â  kindness

1.16.24  4:03 am   opinions on places with the same names like liverpool, ny and liverpool, uk?

Â Â Â Â Â  great. i love those types of places. if there's 2 places with the same name i always love both

1.16.24  3:51 am   Would you consider Velcro to be revolutionary?

Â Â Â Â Â  probably

1.16.24  3:00 am   Tips for coping with how hard it is to learn Arabic?

Â Â Â Â Â  the first thing is to choose what regional version of the language you want to learn, because they are vastly different. you may have already gotten past that step, but i have not. so i don't know too much about what comes next

1.16.24  1:03 am   Do Melodies Have To Be Improv Sessions First?

Â Â Â Â Â  no

1.16.24  12:45 am   why do strings always sound like they're crying?

Â Â Â Â Â  they don't sound like that to me, but that idea has been enforced in the culture, probably starting with the use of violins in sad movie scenes. there are plenty of jovial and happy ways to use violins and other types of strings

1.16.24  12:05 am   I have the chance to do something that will make me so incredibly happy but I don't feel I'm worthy of the experience nor the happiness. Should I do it?

Â Â Â Â Â  it would be irresponsible of me to advise here, having no idea what the actual thing is

Â Â Â Â Â it comes back quick, often seeming better than before

1.15.24  10:22 pm   I'm having trouble setting goals for the new year. Everything I can think of is either unactionable or what I'm already doing. How can I figure out what I want?

Â Â Â Â Â  you're doing fine. no need to let the calendar distract you

1.15.24  9:47 pm   can you still not handle the lobster section?

Â Â Â Â Â  i have yet to even admit that there is a lobster section

1.15.24  9:32 pm   how large of a scope can a project have before it seems unmanageable/impossible

Â Â Â Â Â  around size 10, that starts to happen

1.15.24  8:51 pm   When improvising, is it normal to run out of ideas quite quickly when you stick to a single scale? I just end up quoting licks over and over again after a few minutes of "good" improv. Also In terms of keys there are a few I can't improvise well at all in (I play piano) such as like B or F# coz the way the fingering is due to the scales involved is just trickier. Do you encounter these problems too?

Â Â Â Â Â  life is a world of changes. so whatever the 'rule' was, at one moment, you will be called upon to change it soon. improvisation is a good chance to be faced with this problem, and be challenged to re-invent the context again and again. soon you may find a great scheme for making these rule changes, then of course that will stop working and you will be called upon to try a new rule-changing scheme

1.15.24  8:47 pm   How do I stop impulsively saying "Fuck you" to anyone who says something that offends me?

Â Â Â Â Â  start saying 'thank you, i appreciate that' every time instead

Â Â Â Â Â the intentions of the sandwich

     like you need bread for it to be a sandwich but then also what's a sandwich without the contents?

Â Â Â Â Â  a nothing sandwich

1.15.24  3:40 am   Thank you for being you. How does do that?

Â Â Â Â Â i have no idea

     Would you ever be willing to play a game of room-temperature potato with me?

Â Â Â Â Â ok. somewhere in the world there is probably a room temperature potato. your move

      Thank you for igniting my soul with whimsy. Again how does do that?

Â Â Â Â Â i'm not sure

     What's a small thing that makes you happy? 

Â Â Â Â Â  i'm not sure. different things make me feel different at different times, but at best it's often not exactly what i was expecting. therefore i don't think it's unreasonable that i can't name a thing in response to this question

1.15.24  2:29 am   how to combat boredom?

Â Â Â Â Â  how about traveling to the direct center of outer space

1.15.24  1:54 am   hey bill, I know what your favorite shape is, and that you also think it is the best shape. Is it your favorite shape because it is the best shape, or is it the best shape because it is your favorite shape.

Â Â Â Â Â  none of the above. everything about what you just said is wildly incorrect

1.15.24  1:30 am   Would you rather be decent at many things or really good at one thing?

Â Â Â Â Â  why not both

Â Â Â Â Â  no but that doesn't mean they aren't good

1.14.24  11:10 pm   what do you think of the notion that songwriters are just channels for a higher power/consciousness

Â Â Â Â Â  might as well be like that for all people in general. or all everything in general, actually

1.14.24  10:38 pm   what is music theory

Â Â Â Â Â nothing, or anything

     and why does it give me a feeling of dread i cannot describe with words?

Â Â Â Â Â maybe you thought it was supposed to be something. but then deep down maybe you are aware that music cannot be described
